channel.title: Dave's linkblog feed
channel.description: My linkblog has been around in various locations for many years.

item.description: Jon Stewart reveals the moment he fell out with Apple.
item.source:markdown: Jon Stewart reveals the moment he fell out with Apple.

item.description:
This is what we don't do in software -- study each others' creations.

You can barely get anyone to even look at the simplest stuff.

Amazing how people bet their whole careers and businesses without any information on what other people are creating. No wonder new generations of software knock out previous generations. No one has any curiosity, respect.
item.source:markdown:
This is what we don't do in software -- study each others' creations.
You can barely get anyone to even look at the simplest stuff.
Amazing how people bet their whole careers and businesses without any information on what other people are creating. No wonder new generations of software knock out previous generations. No one has any curiosity, respect.

item.description: Trump voters want revenge. It doesn't have much to do with inflation or unemployment, material wealth. It's deeper than that. We're all living a lie, that if we had money we'd be happy. The sad truth is no one is happy with this arrangement.
